external_games.name: Heroes & Generals - US Soldier Pack: Light Tanker

name: Heroes & Generals: US Soldier Pack - Light Tanker
summary: This Soldier Pack includes a Tank Crew Soldier with a Light Tank arsenal, 3 tanks armed and ready to take on your enemy. Their size and ability matches their intention, challenge medium armored tanks and go head to head in combat against light armored vehicles and suppress the enemy infantry!
